Sentencas: In this paper, the effect of particle velocity on the characteristics of atmospheric plasma-sprayed yttria stabilized zirconia was investigated through adjusting auxiliary helium flow rate.
Titulo: Effect of in-flight particle velocity on the performance of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolyte coating for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The temperature and velocity of in-flight particles were measured with the DPV2000 diagnostic system.
Titulo: Effect of in-flight particle velocity on the performance of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolyte coating for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results showed that helium flow rate significantly influenced particle velocity and less distinctly influenced particle temperature.
Titulo: Effect of in-flight particle velocity on the performance of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolyte coating for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The microstructure of the coatings was characterized by scanning electron microscopy and X-ray diffraction analyzer.
Titulo: Effect of in-flight particle velocity on the performance of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolyte coating for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of the deposits through thickness direction was measured by a potentiostat/galvanostat based on three-electrode assembly approach in a temperature range of 500-1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of in-flight particle velocity on the performance of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolyte coating for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The specific gas permeability was estimated through measuring the coating gas flow rate with a home-made experimental setup.
Titulo: Effect of in-flight particle velocity on the performance of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolyte coating for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results showed that the gas permeability was improved by increasing the in-flight particle velocity.
Titulo: Effect of in-flight particle velocity on the performance of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolyte coating for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the in-flight particle velocity had little effect on the ionic conductivity of specimens.
Titulo: Effect of in-flight particle velocity on the performance of plasma-sprayed YSZ electrolyte coating for solid oxide fuel cells
